    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Empath's Cordial](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2083)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=130" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 89 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 65 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The pale liquid of _empath's cordial_ changes color to reflect the mood of the creature nearest to it—turning blue for calm, red for anger, and green for envious, among other hues. For 1 hour after you drink this potion, you can sense the presence of general emotions, such as hostility toward you or the presence of an [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effect impacting a creature's emotions, within 30 feet. A creature that failed a saving throw against [_calm emotions_](/Spells.aspx?ID=31) can't be detected. This potion doesn't allow you to automatically tell what emotions a specific creature is experiencing, but you can attempt a Perception check with a +2 item bonus (DC set by the GM) to discern that information. The potion also grants you a +1 item bonus to Perception checks to [Sense Motive](/Actions.aspx?ID=85) against creatures whose emotions you can sense.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
